originalText.text: I don't know much about this school and during my 8th grade year I believe it sound like a lot of fun just like the next guy (poor unfortunate soul) but these comments are really sending me mixed signals. Is it good or bad. Bad or good. I need to know. I want to weigh out my pros and cons before I can finally start making decisions and either screw up my life or prevail and get into college. I sound like a geek sry. But I don't want to end up like some other girl in the hood. I just want to go to a good high school.

text.text: I don't know much about this school and during my 8th grade year I believe it sound like a lot of fun just like the next guy (poor unfortunate soul) but these comments are really sending me mixed signals. Is it good or bad. Bad or good. I need to know. I want to weigh out my pros and cons before I can finally start making decisions and either screw up my life or prevail and get into college. I sound like a geek sry. But I don't want to end up like some other girl in the hood. I just want to go to a good high school.

originalText.text: First two years here was good, teacher's were somewhat motivating and work was sufficient enough for me to say I learned something. However, towards the end of junior year everything was just going downhill; teacher's were complaining about the principal being unreasonable and just not making sense. By senior year there was an entirely new english department and the few of the teachers that were left cared about our education which I would say were about a handful only. The education here is not something you would want to have for 4 years of your high school time. If it wasn't for Roy (parent coordinator) I would of transferred out by my sophomore year to Hunter.

originalText.text: I am a Sophmore at this school and i honestly feel like im wasting my time . This school is too strict & the teachers still dont know how to control there classes . I could literaly sit in a class quiet , staring at the teacher & the whole perriod would be about stopping the people that are disturbing the lesson . There are better school out there and i belive this is not one to settle in .

originalText.text: I'm in 8th grade and seeing these reviews, I really don't know if I should go to this high school or not. From Brooklyn, can you get there by the B train or no? And do you have to transfer to a bus or something when you get off?
